mapper.select: SELECT trx.trx_id, r.rating_id, r.mb_id AS rater_id, r.rating_score, r.rating_create_date, g.goods_id, g.goods_title, gi.goods_images_path, IF(g.seller_id LIKE #{myId}, trx.mb_id, g.seller_id) AS opponent_id, IF(g.seller_id LIKE #{myId}, mb.mb_nick, g.seller_nick) AS opponent_nick FROM `imint`.`transaction` AS trx JOIN `imint`.`goods` AS g ON trx.goods_id = g.goods_id JOIN (SELECT mb_id, mb_nick FROM `imint`.`member`) AS mb on trx.mb_id = mb.mb_id LEFT JOIN `imint`.`goods_images` AS gi ON g.goods_id = gi.goods_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM `imint`.`rating` WHERE mb_id LIKE #{myId}) AS r ON r.trx_id = trx.trx_id WHERE trx.trx_isdelete = FALSE AND (gi.goods_images_isdelete = FALSE OR gi.goods_images_isdelete IS NULL) AND (g.seller_id LIKE #{myId} OR trx.mb_id LIKE #{myId}) AND trx.trx_id = #{trxId} AND gi.goods_images_thumbnail = TRUE
